Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.IAeAttachmentManager

Packages that use IAeAttachmentManager
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine The BPEL engine, support classes, and engine factory.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery This package contains classes for recovering or regenerating the state of a process from alarms, messages, or faults that the process received. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage This package contains classes for storing the state of BPEL processes to an external storage facility.
